divs: Sighting DetailsFor four days in a row my girlfriend and have went on our balcony facing SW to smoke a cigarette(a pack a day so we othere quite a bit) and there has been a light brighter than any star, plane, satellite.. It is to the SW varying from 215���-240���. We have lived here for a while and leaned on that balcony looking out thousands of times, but the past week has been unreal I'm a Marine Corps Veteran and was the lead vehicle commander for convoys because my attention to detail is so fine tuned I would notice every new piece of trash, change in landscape, and street, shop, vendor, and pretty much everything else after being through one time. This object will stay stationary and then disappear instantly.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were no other sightings in Fayetteville on or around October 1st 2013
Summary: Fourth night in a row a brilliant light will be stationary for over fifteen minutes then disappear.
